org.numenta.nupic.util

Class FlatMatrixSupport<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.FlatMatrixSupport<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlatMatrix<T>, Matrix<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitSetMatrix, FlatArrayMatrix, SparseMatrixSupport

    public abstract class FlatMatrixSupport<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatMatrix<T>
    Support class for flat Matrix implementations.
    Author:
    David Ray, Jose Luis Martin

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlatMatrixSupport

        public FlatMatrixSupport(int[] dimensions)
        Constructs a new FlatMatrixSupport object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - the dimensions of this matrix

      • FlatMatrixSupport

        public FlatMatrixSupport(int[] dimensions,
                         boolean useColumnMajorOrdering)
        Constructs a new FlatMatrixSupport object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - the dimensions of this sparse array
        useColumnMajorOrdering - flag indicating whether to use column ordering or row major ordering. if false (the default), then row major ordering will be used. If true, then column major ordering will be used.
